long_description: The Patagonia Capilene(R) 4 Expedition Weight Beanie is an unflappable partner for fast-moving ascents when the weather is less than optimal. Wear it alone or under a helmet. Capilene 4 is Patagonia's warmest and most breathable synthetic baselayer for keeping you dry and comfortable in cold conditions; it has a soft, stretchy and compressible feel. Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fleece has a smooth jersey face that glides beneath layers and a brushed-fleece interior that insulates, wicks moisture and is soft next to skin. Helmet-friendly fit with a flat-seam construction for next-to-skin comfort and a low-profile.
short_description: The Patagonia Capilene(R) 4 Expedition Weight Beanie is an unflappable partner for fast-moving ascents when the weather is less than optimal. Wear it alone or under a helmet.
